channel.title: HighTivity v1, 317 PKing Economy Server!
channel.description:
Hello all,
I found a development team of 3 (including me) and we all have an alright knowledge of coding.
This server will be sort of like TRPK, but a LOT more organized.
It will take like 3 hours to get maxed cmb stats and a week for a good bank. I want a reasonable economy on it too.
One novice coder (me) (I also know how to run a good, clean, organized website + forum, and code html, css) One website coder One in-game supporter. (like an admin that goes around helping people.) (we will get more once server grows)
[i]*We use skype to communicate.*[/i]
I need two more people,
One graphics designer Another coder.
Thanks, anthdukaj

I found a development team of 3 (including me) and we all have an alright knowledge of coding.

This server will be sort of like TRPK, but a LOT more organized.

It will take like 3 hours to get maxed cmb stats and a week for a good bank. I want a reasonable economy on it too.

One novice coder (me) (I also know how to run a good, clean, organized website + forum, and code html, css)
One website coder
One in-game supporter. (like an admin that goes around helping people.) (we will get more once server grows)

We use skype to communicate.

Thanks,
anthdukaj[/quote]
ZOMG, you’re a teenage girl?

Read full topic

item.title: HighTivity v1, 317 PKing Economy Server!
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“anthdukaj, post:3, topic:440786”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=543460.msg3983345#msg3983345 date=1335564778]
You need to provide information of your server, also some pictures to persuade us to apply.
[/quote]

Haven’t found a source/client yet. That’s going to be decided when I get my full team.[/quote]Why post then? Only post, when you have actually done something…
